name: Crazy Pedicab Driver
description:
Pick your pedicab and drive it like crazy through the endless roads of traffic, earn cash, upgrade, customize, and collect all of the pedicab.

FEATURE LIST
- Smooth and simple control
- Unlock a variety of pedicab customization
- Upgrade and customize your pedicab
- Many types of traffic vehicles including cars, trucks, SUVs, buses.
- Play offline

GAMEPLAY
- Tilt or Touch to steer depends on setting
- Touch pedal button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

TIPS
- The faster you drive the more scores you get
- Overtake cars closely to get Near Miss bonus

FUTURE UPDATES
- Character customization
- More pedicab
- More pedicab customization
- More roads
- More traffic vehicles

Crazy Pedicab Driver does NOT require any internet connection, you can play it anywhere and anytime. We will continuously update the game with new content and makes sure the game run smoothly on any device.

FOLLOW US

* Twitter: https://twitter.com/agrarisent
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/agrarisent
